text: 1.19: Sng 119.105; Zo 5.35; VB 2.28Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza guigira khaŋ tɨga havhargiap, mba Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ gumgi suaŋgi buni, nza guigira nta khothɨgi. Nde vhɨra, mbe suaŋgi buni, nde nta suira havhargirga, ne nzerarga. Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ gumgi nzuai buni, nta rama fara muuŋgiap gɨngɨngi ŋaneŋ ga ntorgap kav shi. Mba ram, ana mbara muuŋgip shiv kɨrim, Zisas taagi zirɨrga raan mɨn thugɨrga. Nden ndavi vheri Krais ntan vhen kɨv, ana nta shɨrarga, nta mba mɨn gorim, manera ndai kam kha nuiana shɨrigi farar muuŋgip nta shararga. 1.19 Mba mɨn gorim manera ndai kam, ana Zisas ma. Ndu Vhagi Buni ndi hiaŋ rɨgi gap sapta 22 ves 16 ganɨri.
